Darkfate/Wespah/Manthys::

"Wespah and Manthys can show them, " answered Darkfate "Could you 
tell me your name? Well you can tell me it later..."

"YESZZZZZZ, we can show where are" said Wespah.

"Just, follow us" Said Mandthys 

And the two femmes slowly walked toward a corritor.
